document.full_text: novak djokovic booked another dream final against rafa nadal but was pushed to the limit before he beat andy murray 6-1 3-6 7-6 in an exhilarating match at the rome masters saturday.
document.title: djokovic battles past gutsy murray to set up nadal final
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic booked another dream final against rafa nadal but was pushed to the limit before he beat andy murray 6-1 3-6 7-6 in an exhilarating match at the rome masters saturday.
